Added 

[TeXFonts]
; TX Adobe Times
rtxptmb=TeXBase1Encoding,Times-Bold,
rtxptmbo=TeXBase1Encoding,Times-Bold,.167 SlantFont
rtxptmbi=TeXBase1Encoding,Times-BoldItalic,
rtxptmr=TeXBase1Encoding,Times-Roman,
rtxptmro=TeXBase1Encoding,Times-Roman,.167 SlantFont
rtxptmri=TeXBase1Encoding,Times-Italic,
